posts.post_content: T205 Cy Young -  No longer for sale

What an incredible card!!! Leon, how can you part with this one??

Joe K.

[quote name="Moonlight Graham" post=2490794]What an incredible card!!! Leon, how can you part with this one??

Joe K.[/QUOTE]

Thanks for the kind words, Joe. 
I bought it for resale but I am contemplating selling one of my Cobb's and keeping it .... We'll see.
That card should be in a museum!

Sorry to add another non transaction based comment on a sales thread but Wow! 

By the title I was anticipating seeing a 1/2 and the first thing I see clicking on it is this beauty! GLWTS, one of the best cards I've seen on net54 which is saying a lot.
Nice Leon- Very tough card to find this nice and centered as well. This in all the years looking is top 2-3 that I've ever seen. The sale of this this means that you're buying me something?...lol
That beautiful Young should be in a 7 holder.

A bump with a bit lower price. Look around and try to find a better 6  (or 7 for that matter)

And thanks again for the kind words, guys.

[quote name="LincolnVT" post=2492629]A beauty![/QUOTE]

Thanks Ethan. And a price adjustment. Compare this one to others....

No longer for sale
